topic.title: Syntax Highlighting in Relax NG Schemas

body.p:
To customize the colors or styles used for the syntax highlighting colors for Relax NG schemas, follow these steps:
.
Go to Editor Syntax Highlight .
Select and expand the XML section in the top pane (for RELAX NG Compact Syntax schemas, select and expand the RNC section).
Select the component you want to change and customize the colors or styles using the selectors to the right of the pane.
Select the XML tab in the Preview pane to see the effects of your changes (for RELAX NG Compact Syntax schemas, the tab is RNC).
body.note: also allows you to specify syntax highlighting colors for specific XML elements and attributes with specific namespace prefixes. This can be done in the Editor Syntax Highlight Elements/Attributes by Prefix preferences page.
